value.name: idle noncombat
value.tooltip: played randomly and intermittently whenever we aren't in combat

value.name: idle combat
value.tooltip: played randomly and intermittently whenever we're in combat

value.name: idle flee
value.tooltip: played continuously while we are fleeing

value.name: maimed limb

value.name: death agonizing

value.tooltip: died instantly

value.name: death flying
value.tooltip: died and was blown up into the air

value.name: friend died
value.tooltip: a friendly AI died

value.name: friend player died
value.tooltip: a friendly player died

value.name: friend killed by friend
value.tooltip: a friend died from friendly fire

value.name: friend killed by friendly player
value.tooltip: friend died from player's friendly fire

value.name: friend killed by enemy
value.tooltip: a friend died from enemy fire

value.name: friend killed by enemy player
value.tooltip: friend died from an enemy player

value.name: friend killed by covenant
value.tooltip: a friend died from covenant fire

value.name: friend killed by flood
value.tooltip: a friend died from the flood

value.name: friend killed by sentinel
value.tooltip: a friend died from sentinel fire

value.name: friend betrayed
value.tooltip: a friend was deliberately killed by an ally that we don't trust (e.g. player killed a marine)

value.name: new combat alone
value.tooltip: see an enemy and we have not previously been in combat

value.name: new enemy recent combat
value.tooltip: see a new enemy and we have recently been in combat

value.name: old enemy sighted
value.tooltip: see an enemy that we are currently looking for

value.name: unexpected enemy
value.tooltip: unexpectedly encounters enemy (behind or to the side)

value.name: dead friend found
value.tooltip: unexpectedly finds a dead body of a friend

value.name: alliance broken
value.tooltip: we decide that a former ally is now a traitor

value.name: alliance reformed
value.tooltip: we forgive a traitor and make him our friend again

value.name: grenade throwing
value.tooltip: throwing a grenade

value.name: grenade sighted
value.tooltip: see an enemy grenade

value.name: grenade startle
value.tooltip: alerted by a grenade bouncing near us

value.name: grenade danger enemy
value.tooltip: in danger from an enemy grenade

value.name: grenade danger self
value.tooltip: in danger from your own grenade

value.name: grenade danger friend
value.tooltip: in danger from a friendly grenade (not our own)

value.name: new combat group re
value.tooltip: reply to a nearby friend who alerted us to an enemy

value.name: new combat nearby re
value.tooltip: reply to a distant friend who alerted us to an enemy

value.name: alert friend
value.tooltip: alert a friend who is in a noncombat state

value.name: alert friend re
value.tooltip: alerted by a friend when in a noncombat state

value.name: alert lost contact
value.tooltip: alert friends that target was not at expected location

value.name: alert lost contact re
value.tooltip: alert friends that target was not at expected location

value.name: blocked
value.tooltip: friend is blocking us from moving or firing

value.name: blocked re
value.tooltip: friend is blocking us from moving or firing

value.name: search start
value.tooltip: starting to search

value.name: search query
value.tooltip: asking searchers whether they have found anything

value.name: search query re
value.tooltip: asking searchers whether they have found anything

value.name: search report
value.tooltip: searcher reporting that an area is clear

value.name: search abandon
value.tooltip: searcher giving up on search

value.name: search group abandon
value.tooltip: search coordinator giving up on search

value.name: group uncover
value.tooltip: starting to uncover target with friend

value.name: group uncover re
value.tooltip: starting to uncover target

value.name: advance
value.tooltip: our platoon starts to attack or advance

value.name: advance re
value.tooltip: our platoon starts to attack or advance

value.name: retreat
value.tooltip: our platoon starts to defend or retreat

value.name: retreat re
value.tooltip: our platoon starts to defend or retreat

value.name: cover
value.tooltip: telling friends to seek cover

value.name: sighted friend player
value.tooltip: sighted a new friendly player

value.name: shooting
value.tooltip: shooting at an enemy

value.name: shooting vehicle
value.tooltip: shooting from a vehicle at an enemy

value.name: shooting berserk
value.tooltip: shooting at an enemy while berserk

value.name: shooting group
value.tooltip: shooting at a group of enemies

value.name: shooting traitor
value.tooltip: shooting at a traitorous player

value.name: taunt
value.tooltip: taunting the enemy

value.name: taunt re
value.tooltip: taunted by an enemy

value.name: flee
value.tooltip: fleeing in panic

value.name: flee re
value.tooltip: fleeing in panic

value.name: flee leader died
value.tooltip: fleeing in panic because our leaders are all dead

value.name: attempted flee
value.tooltip: unable to flee because a leader is nearby

value.name: attempted flee re
value.tooltip: unable to flee because a leader is nearby - response

value.name: lost contact
value.tooltip: target was not at expected location

value.name: hiding finished
value.tooltip: stops hiding and pursues target

value.name: vehicle entry
value.tooltip: enters vehicle

value.name: vehicle exit
value.tooltip: exits vehicle

value.name: vehicle woohoo
value.tooltip: excited while in vehicle (big air, etc)

value.name: vehicle scared
value.tooltip: scared while in vehicle (imminent crash)

value.name: vehicle collision
value.tooltip: riding in a vehicle and the driver collides with something

value.name: partially sighted
value.tooltip: saw something suspicious but not sure it was an enemy

value.name: nothing there
value.tooltip: decided that a suspicious sighting was nothing after all

value.name: pleading
value.tooltip: pleading for the player to spare our pitiable lives

value.name: surprise
value.tooltip: surprised by an enemy, noise, body or weapon impact

value.name: berserk
value.tooltip: went berserk

value.name: melee attack
value.tooltip: attacked an enemy in melee

value.name: dive
value.tooltip: dove away from danger or into cover

value.name: uncover exclamation
value.tooltip: leapt out of corner to uncover a suspected target

value.name: leap attack
value.tooltip: begin a leap attack

value.name: resurrection
value.tooltip: arise and return to life

value.name: celebration
value.tooltip: all enemies defeated

value.name: check body enemy
value.tooltip: post-combat checking an enemy's dead body

value.name: check body friend
value.tooltip: post-combat checking a friend's dead body

value.name: shooting dead enemy
value.tooltip: post-combat shooting an enemy's dead body

value.name: shooting dead enemy player
value.tooltip: post-combat shooting an enemy player's dead body

value.name: alone
value.tooltip: post-combat all friends killed

value.name: unscathed
value.tooltip: post-combat we were not hurt

value.name: seriously wounded
value.tooltip: post-combat we were badly hurt

value.name: seriously wounded re
value.tooltip: post-combat replying to a friend who was badly hurt

value.name: massacre
value.tooltip: post-combat our friends took heavy casualties

value.name: massacre re
value.tooltip: post-combat reply

value.name: rout
value.tooltip: post-combat our friends kicked alien ass

value.name: rout re
value.tooltip: post-combat reply
